name: Assembly Bot
description:
A gamepad with dual analog joysticks is required to play this game!

In Assemby Bot you try to control a robot which is tasked to weld chips to circuit boards. Each finished circuit board will make the robot faster, stronger and harder to control.

Controls:
- Move the left joystick to move the left welding finger
- Move the right joystick to move the right welding finger

Instructions:
Weld chips to the board by by pointing both welding-fingers simultaneously to the two contacts. Try not to damage the chips with the lasers.

Good Luck!
